amendment.description: Amendment prevents federal agencies from implementing significant policy changes without appropriate congressional review and requires bringing administrative rules having an economic impact of $100 million or more (as scored by OMB) before Congress for a vote.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 11 printed in Part B of House Report 113-187 to prevent federal agencies from implementing significant policy changes without appropriate congressional review. The amendment brings administrative rules having an economic impact of $100 million or more as scored by OMB before Congress for a vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Webster (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
